EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, 650 PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
IN 33-31N 012-10E AT 040927Z APR. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
